title: WooCommerce Customer Manager - Email templates configurator

fields.label: Guest to registerd user conversion -  email template
fields.name: wccm_guest_to_registered_email_template
fields.instructions:
Paste a VALID HTML EMAIL CODE (not all the html tags can be used) in the following text area. It will be used as template for the email sent when a customer is converted from guest to registered. The email will contain the new credentials (user and password). Use {first_name}, {last_name}, {billing_first_name}, {billing_last_name}, {shipping_first_name}, {shipping_last_name} placeholders to render user first and last names in the email body.

NOTE: include the shortode [message_body] inside your custom template otherwise the credentials will not be included.

fields.label: Guest to registerd user conversion - include deafault WooCommerce email header and footer?
fields.name: wccm_guest_to_registered_header_footer_inlcude
fields.instructions: You can choose to include the default WooCommerce email header and footer in the guest to registered notification email

fields.label: Guest to registered user conversion - template preview
fields.name: wcam_guest_to_registered_user_conversion_template_preview
fields.instructions: Here you can preview the template. To show the preview please hit "Save" button after having pasted the template HTML code.

fields.label: Customer notification - email template
fields.name: wccm_customer_notification_email_template
fields.instructions:
Paste a VALID HTML EMAIL CODE (not all the html tags can be used) in the following text area. It will be used for user notifications emails (bulk emails or emails sent throught customer details page). Use {first_name}, {last_name}, {billing_first_name}, {billing_last_name}, {shipping_first_name}, {shipping_last_name} placeholders to render user first and last names in the email body.

NOTE: include the shortode [message_body] inside your custom template otherwise the notification message will not be included.

fields.label: Customer notification - include deafault WooCommerce email header and footer?
fields.name: wccm_customer_notification_header_footer_inlcude
fields.instructions: You can choose to include the default WooCommerce email header and footer in the customer notifications emails

fields.label: Customer notification - template preview
fields.name: wcam_customer_notification_template_preview
fields.instructions: Here you can preview the template. To show the preview please hit "Save" button after having pasted the template HTML code.
